scripts.serve: bundle exec jekyll b --watch & cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "postcss front/main.css -o public/css/main.css --watch"  "live-server ./public"
scripts.forestry-serve: bundle exec jekyll b --watch --drafts --unpublished --future & cross-env concurrently "postcss front/main.css -o public/css/main.css --watch"  "live-server --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8080 ./public"
scripts.development: JEKYLL_ENV=development bundle exec jekyll b; cross-env NODE_ENV=development postcss front/main.css -o public/css/main.css
scripts.staging: JEKYLL_ENV=staging     bundle exec jekyll b; cross-env NODE_ENV=staging     postcss front/main.css -o public/css/main.css
scripts.production: JEKYLL_ENV=production  bundle exec jekyll b; cross-env NODE_ENV=production  postcss front/main.css -o public/css/main.css
